var result = arr

for j in queries{

	let (s, e) = (j[0], j[1])
	
        for i in (s...e) {

import Foundation

func solution(_ arr:[Int], _ queries:[[Int]]) -> [Int] {
    
    var result = arr
    
    for j in queries{
        
    let (s, e) = (j[0], j[1])
    
        for i in (s...e) {
        
            result[i] += 1

        }

    }
    return result
}
